casebody.data:
STOCUM
v.
OAKLEY AND PINEHURST CLINIC. No. 444P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 17, 2007. Gary S. Parsons, Gavin B. Parsons, Cynthia M. Currin, Raleigh, for Stocums.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of September 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Response to Petition for Discretionary Review:

*889"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of September 2007."
